job.title: Software Engineer, New Grad
job.description: Contracts are the atomic unit of business  everything important that a company does involves a contract sales purchases hires everything Every company in every country in every industry runs on contracts but managing these contracts slows companies down and costs them millions of dollarsbrbrAt Ironclad were reimagining contracts Were turning them from rate limiters on the business to accelerators Ironclad is the 1 contract lifecycle management platform for innovative companies LOral Staples MasterCard and other leading innovators use Ironclad to collaborate and negotiate on contracts accelerate contracting while maintaining compliance and turn contracts into critical carriers of operational business intelligence Its the only platform flexible enough to handle every type of contract workflow whether a sales agreement an HR agreement or a complex NDAbrbrIronclads innovation and work culture has been recognized by Forbes 50 Most Promising AI Companies in 2021 Fortunes Best Small amp Medium Workplaces 2021 Fast Companys 2020 Best Workplaces for Innovators Glassdoors best Machine Learning startup Enterprise Tech 30 List and is backed by leading investors like Accel Y Combinator Sequoia and Bond For more information visit wwwironcladappcom or follow us on LinkedIn and TwitterbrbrEngineering  IroncladbrbrAs an Engineering New Grad youll have the opportunity to learn quickly and grow with a worldclass team of engineers Youll work crossfunctionally to identify business problems and architect build and verify solutions Youll build a platform that lets lawyers scale themselves and their businesses 100x more effectively At Ironclad weve built a product that brings a two thousand year old profession into the digital age and youll play a pivotal role in driving the foundation forwardbrbrWe seek engineers with strong coding fundamentals and a track record of shipping high quality products We work in a highly collaborative environment and strive to foster a positive inclusive culture Were in hypergrowth tripling our team size at all levels and offer remote work flexibility If youd like to join us on our mission to build the product that legal teams love lets talkbrbrstrong What Youll Do brstrongulliWork with and learn from a strong team of engineers We grow our new grads through mentorship and ownershipliliCollaborate with designers product managers and other engineers to spec design and build features and systemsliliWork with quality engineers to define build and maintain testing strategyliliProvide thoughtful feedback to others on the teamliliHelp interview and recruit talented engineers to IroncladliliWork on a modern stack built upon TypeScript ReactJS Nodejs Java and Docker containers in Kubernetes on Google Cloud Platform experience with these specific technologies not requiredbrbrliulstrong What We Look For brstrongulliPassion to learn about and gain experience in architecting building launching and maintaining complex systemsliliA high bar for qualityliliPassionate about learning and sharing knowledgeliliStrong crossteam communication and collaboration skillsliliRecently obtained or are pursuing a BABS andor MAMS degree in computer science math or a related technical field or technical training liliIronclads Values drive intent integrity and empathybrbrliulstrong Benefits amp Perks brstrongulliCompetitive compensationliliHealth dental and vision insurancelili401kliliWellness reimbursementliliTake what you need vacation policyliliGenerous parental leave for both primary and secondary caregiversliliCommuter benefitsliliWork in our beautiful San Francisco office and remote work flexibilitybrliulPursuant to the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records
